text:
anyone have any tips for meeting people to create job opportunities in the pandemic? Normally I could like ask if someone wants a coffee on me or something, but there's no way thats happening now.

Or if its possible for "young" people to consult?

elements.text:
anyone have any tips for meeting people to create job opportunities in the pandemic? Normally I could like ask if someone wants a coffee on me or something, but there's no way thats happening now.

Or if its possible for "young" people to consult?

text: When you say "meeting people to create job opportunities", do you mean like networking? Or do you mean like finding clients for your personal business/brand?

elements.text: When you say "meeting people to create job opportunities", do you mean like networking? Or do you mean like finding clients for your personal business/brand?

text: I mean like telling people how I can improve their lives/companies by doing stuff they aren't doing but should be doing so please give me a job.

elements.text: I mean like telling people how I can improve their lives/companies by doing stuff they aren't doing but should be doing so please give me a job.

text: I see what you mean now. Interesting! I don't have any experience with that. But maybe others will. I wanted to ask for clarification in case people reading the post by weren't sure what you meant.
